A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching TLJ twice I have concluded that it is my least favorite SW film so far. There is a lot of wonderful eye candy in this film however the overbearing horrible writing\, character development\, plot holes and cheesy attempt at self deprecating humor had me less involved as a viewer. I left the theater feeling underwhelmed regardless of my initial expectations. I hope JJ Abrams can turn this around. In the end I did enjoy the fight scenes and twists\, but the quest to find the code cracker scenes should have simply been removed.
